description:
It was hard to tell what Gabriel was going to be like when I first met him. At first glance, I saw a 5'9" muscle power house standing quietly in front of me and I thought to myself, "I better not ask any off-the-wall questions." But it turns out that he was actually very nice, soft spoken, and open to all sorts of questions.
He's 21 and was a star football player during his school years. He's really into keeping his body in top shape and once he got naked, I couldn't have been happier that he is! Head to toe, he is a perfect muscle stud. He's naturally smooth too. I noticed a slight accent and it turns out that he is Italian which was kind of shocking because Italians tend to be more hairy. But hairy or not, Gabriel is absolutely sexy.
I was really impressed with his body and wondered if he did anything else than the standard gym routine.
"How often do you workout?" I asked.
"Five, six times a week."
"Couple of hours a day?"
"Yeah. 'Bout that," He replied with his heavy accent.
"Do you do any kick boxing or anything like that?"
"Uh, nah. Not really... I'm not really a fighter."
Could have fooled me!
title: Gabriel
